EditTextPreference.android:summary: The email ID registered with Note It! This email ID will also be used in case you forget your password.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Remember Me
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Note It! will not remember your login information. You will have to sign in everytime.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Note It! will remember your login infotmation and sign you in automatically.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Start with Dashboard
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Note It! will launch with your last used Shopping List open.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Note It! will launch with the Dashboard open.

ListPreference.android:summary: The default currency you want to use.

ListPreference.android:title: Measurement Units
ListPreference.android:summary: Set the preferred units of measurement.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show suggestions
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Note It will not display suggestions as you type item names
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Note It will display suggestions as you add items to your list.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Share Location
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Do not share location with Note It!
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Allow Note It! to use location for improved search and other services.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Delete all items on list
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: A Shopping List with items in it, cannot be deleted.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Deleting a Shopping List deletes all items in the list.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Extras
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Extra details like Price, Quantity and Total will not be displayed with items.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Display extra information like Price, Quantity and Total with each Item.

ListPreference.android:title: Item Font Size
ListPreference.android:summary: The size of the font used to display items in the list

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Hide Completed Items
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Don't hide items when they are marked done.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Hide items when they are marked done.
